elements.content: II14(a) Time-dependent UV-Vis spectra of 1 on Xe light irradiation. The inset shows photographic images of the photochromic effects. (b) ESR spectra of 1 during the photochromic processes. Note that the small signals around g = 2.00 for 1a and decolored samples were caused by unexpected light during sample handling and ESR measurements.
